customer_reviews.title: It's a Bargain, It Smells Great, It WORKS
customer_reviews.text: Every now and then one comes across a bargain-priced brand that also happens to be an industry leader for effectiveness as well. Head and Shoulders shampoo sits squarely in that rare air. I have bouts with seborrheic dermatitis that result in flaky skin and in more extreme circumstances sores. My worst symptoms are treated with a week of this shampoo. It simply works. The pump action is sturdy and works well. One pump foams up enough to cover my whole head. The partnership with Old Spice has upped Head and Shoulders aroma game. The scent is exceptionally pleasant and masculine. It smells like a higher-priced shampoo, almost cologne-like without being teenage-boy obnoxious. Overall, it's a win-win-win.

customer_reviews.title: Great on dry scalp
customer_reviews.text: Head and shoulders has always been my go-to dandruff shampoo. Add the old spice scent and this stuff is great. Then a conditioner on top of that makes this shampoo amazing. THis winter has been rough on our scalps and the itch flaky dandruff has started. Just a couple days use and it is under control and the itchy scalp is gone. This shampoo is gentle and can be used daily as a preventative. The scent is pleasant and can be enjoyed by anyone (it is not too masculine). Lathers up well and rinses clean. Pump bottle works great and one pump is great for short hair and 2 for long hair. Great product all the way around

customer_reviews.title: Head and Shoulders on Steroids?
customer_reviews.text: Old reliable must be going through a mid life crisis. There are suddenly massive numbers of new Head and Shoulders products but almost all are geared to do the same thing: get rid of your dandruff with the active proven ingredient of 1% Pyrithione Zinc. For guys, the products with built in conditioner like this one have particular appeal—we wanna wash ‘n go. But remember the old atage: Lather, Rinse, Repeat. This version is new with Old Spice Sport scent. I like the Old Spice fresh scents such as this one much better than the original hot spice version. This product combines the clean and fresh Head and Shoulders original scent and this pure sport addition: a winner.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny

customer_reviews.title: Leaves hair beautiful and manageable
customer_reviews.text: I know this is for men, but both my husband and I used it. It feels very nice on the scalp as you lather. At comb out time, hair is harder to comb out than if I'd used a separate conditioner, but when hair is dry and styled it looks amazing and you get first day hair on the second day, too. So as a shampoo and conditioner, I'm pleased. For dandruff prevention and itchy scalp, this works as well as standard Head and Shoulders, but not as well as those with coal tar like T-Gel. So if you've got really bad dandruff, this may not take care of it, but for garden variety dandruff, this works fine.
customer_reviews.author: E. Burton

customer_reviews.title: You get plenty of it!

It comes in a 2 pack (both the same) in 31.4 oz bottles. This should last a long time. We like the style of the bottle. It dispenses easily with a push-down top. It has an ‘Old Spice’ scent. My fiancé didn’t love the shampoo/conditioner. Old spice isn’t his favorite scent. He also didn’t love the texture. We both thought it felt slimy and gooey. He prefers more of a gel consistency.

product_meta.description: Ever find yourself wanting to fight dandruff and smell better at the same time? Get the best of both worlds with Head & Shoulders Old Spice Pure Sport Men's Anti-Dandruff 2 in 1 Shampoo & Conditioner. Our formula-brought to you by America's #1 dermatologist recommended brand-is gentle enough on hair for everyday use, but powerful enough to stop the toughest flakes. Plus, it leaves your hair with the clean, lemon-lime scent of Old Spice Pure Sport, for a double dose of heavenly smelling, dandruff-fighting confidence associated with dandruff, with regular use Regular use of Head & Shoulders anti dandruff products nourish your scalp three surface layers deep to prevent dryness, flakes and itch, associated with dandruff. The Head & Shoulders collection includes clarifying shampoos, volumizing conditioners, and 2 in 1 combos, so you can introduce dandruff treatment to every step of your hair care routine. With a pH-balanced formula brought to you by America's #1 dermatologist recommended brand, you can count on Head & Shoulders to combat seborrheic dermatitis, and other irritable and itchy scalp conditions associated with dandruff. Head & Shoulders products come in a variety of scents and formulas, and include ingredients like almond oil, tea tree oil, lemon extract, and peppermint. The shampoo & conditioner system are safe to use on color treated, curly or textured hair types, compared to a non-conditioning shampoo.
